description: Returns information about all event data stores in the account, in the current Region.

nested_items.name: EventDataStores
nested_items.description: Contains information about event data stores in the account, in the current Region.

nested_items.name: EventDataStoreArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the event data store.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the event data store.

nested_items.name: TerminationProtectionEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the event data store is protected from termination.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of an event data store.

nested_items.name: AdvancedEventSelectors
nested_items.description: The advanced event selectors that were used to select events for the data store.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: An optional, descriptive name for an advanced event selector, such as 'Log data events for only two S3 buckets'.

nested_items.name: FieldSelectors
nested_items.description: Contains all selector statements in an advanced event selector.

nested_items.name: Field
nested_items.description: A field in a CloudTrail event record on which to filter events to be logged. For event data stores for CloudTrail Insights events, Config configuration items, Audit Manager evidence, or events outside of Amazon Web Services, the field is used only for selecting events as filtering is not supported.

nested_items.name: Equals
nested_items.description: An operator that includes events that match the exact value of the event record field specified as the value of Field. This is the only valid operator that you can use with the readOnly, eventCategory, and resources.type fields.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StartsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that includes events that match the first few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EndsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that includes events that match the last few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotEquals
nested_items.description: An operator that excludes events that match the exact value of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotStartsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that excludes events that match the first few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotEndsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that excludes events that match the last few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MultiRegionEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the event data store includes events from all Regions, or only from the Region in which it was created.

nested_items.name: OrganizationEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates that an event data store is collecting logged events for an organization.

nested_items.name: RetentionPeriod
nested_items.description: The retention period, in days.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the event data store's creation.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp showing when an event data store was updated, if applicable. UpdatedTimestamp is always either the same or newer than the time shown in CreatedTimestamp.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token you can use to get the next page of results.
